name: Factor
intro: The modular building blocks for on-chain asset management
introduce: Factor DAO are building the modular building blocks for on-chain asset management: an infrastructure and liquidity layer for DeFi. All existing DeFi assets aggregated under one roof, enabling the creation of novel instruments and strategies. A one stop solution for protocols looking to boost TVL, treasury managers looking to hedge exposure and generate yield, or aspiring asset managers looking to build on chain track record.
